flawed_nl_solution:
The total amount of money that Zachary received from selling his video games is $40*5 = $<<40*5=200>>200
Jason received 3/10*$200 = $<<3/10*200=60>>60 more than the amount Zachary received after selling his games.
The total amount of money that Jason received is $60+$200 = $<<60+200=620>>620
Together, Zachary and Jason received $620+$200 = $<<620+200=820>>820 from the sale of their video games.
Ryan received $620+$50=$<<620+50=670>>670 from the sale of his video games.
The three friends made a total of $670+$820 = $<<670+820=1490>>1490 from the sale of the video games.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 260, not 620. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
